title: User Registration with Valid Birth Data and City Autocomplete
description: Verify that a user can successfully register by entering valid birth data and selecting a city using the autocomplete feature, with correct birth chart calculation.

steps.description: Navigate to the Onboarding registration page
Input valid birth date, time, and other required birth data
Begin typing a city name in the city autocomplete field
Confirm that a list of city suggestions appears based on input
Select a city from the autocomplete suggestions
Verify the city is correctly populated in the city field
Submit the registration form
Verify successful registration confirmation is shown
Check that birth chart calculations (Solar, Lunar, Rising signs) are correctly computed and saved

title: User Registration with Invalid Birth Data Inputs
description: Verify error handling when user inputs invalid or incomplete birth data during registration.

steps.description: Navigate to the Onboarding registration page
Input invalid birth date formats or missing required birth time
Attempt to submit the registration form
Validate that relevant, user-friendly error messages are displayed indicating invalid or missing birth data
Ensure form submission is prevented until valid data is provided

title: City Autocomplete Handles No Match and Special Characters
description: Verify city autocomplete functionality when users enter non-existent cities, special characters or partial names with no results.

steps.description: Navigate to the city autocomplete input field on Onboarding page
Type a city name that does not exist or use special characters
Check that the autocomplete dropdown correctly shows 'no results' or appropriate feedback
Attempt to submit the form without selecting a valid city
Ensure the form displays an error preventing submission until a valid city is selected

title: Dashboard Displays Accurate Mind, Body, Soul Scores Based on Planetary Transits
description: Verify that the Dashboard correctly calculates and displays Mind, Body, and Soul scores based on real-time planetary transit data.

steps.description: Log in as a registered user with valid birth chart data
Navigate to the Dashboard page
Verify the Dashboard renders the Sync Rings visualization for Mind, Body, and Soul scores
Confirm that the scores correspond accurately to current planetary transit data
Check that action windows and caution periods are correctly indicated on the Dashboard
Ensure the daily AI-generated insight text is visible and relevant to astrological data

title: Dashboard Updates Scores and Insights in Real Time
description: Verify that the Dashboard dynamically updates Mind, Body, Soul scores and daily insights when planetary transit data changes.

steps.description: Log in and open Dashboard page
Simulate change in planetary transit data via backend or mock API
Confirm that Sync Rings scores update accordingly without page refresh
Verify daily AI-generated insights text updates to reflect new astrological context

title: Oracle Chat Provides Personalized Astrological Guidance Based on User Chart and Chat History
description: Verify that Oracle Chat AI understands the user's natal chart and prior conversations, providing context-aware, empathetic, and relevant astrological advice.

steps.description: Log in as a user with completed birth data
Navigate to the Oracle Chat page
Send a query related to user's mental or emotional state
Verify the AI response incorporates user's Solar, Lunar, or Rising signs in its guidance
Send a follow-up question related to prior chat topics
Check that AI shows continuity by referencing previous chat messages
Ensure responses are empathetic, mystical but grounded in astrological principles

title: Oracle Chat Handles Unknown or Unclear Queries Gracefully
description: Validate that Oracle Chat provides meaningful fallback responses when user inputs ambiguous, off-topic, or unclear questions.

steps.description: Navigate to Oracle Chat
Input vague or unrelated questions not relevant to astrology or user's chart
Confirm that Chatbot responds with polite clarification requests or redirection to relevant topics
Verify the app does not crash or display errors

title: Synastry Feature Correctly Compares Two Natal Charts
description: Verify that users can input two natal charts and receive an accurate compatibility analysis based on astrological principles.

steps.description: Navigate to the Synastry comparison page
Input valid birth data for user A including city autocomplete
Input valid birth data for user B including city autocomplete
Submit the synastry comparison request
Verify compatibility calculations are returned and displayed
Confirm that radar chart visualization shows correct data over six compatibility axes

title: Synastry Radar Chart Renders Correctly for Edge Cases
description: Check that the Synastry radar chart renders properly when comparing charts with extreme or boundary birth data values.

steps.description: Navigate to Synastry feature
Input birth data with boundary dates and unusual time zones for both users
Submit the compatibility analysis
Verify the radar chart displays without graphical anomalies or errors
Confirm compatibility scores reflect expected output given the inputs

title: Simulated Annual Payment Gate Works Correctly during Onboarding
description: Verify the simulated payment gate for annual subscription displays during onboarding funnel and correctly handles user response flow.

steps.description: Complete birth data entry in onboarding
Confirm that the simulated annual payment gate screen appears
Choose to accept the annual payment offer
Verify user is correctly routed to the next step or dashboard
Repeat onboarding and choose to decline the payment offer
Confirm user can continue without purchase and onboarding completes

title: Frontend and Backend Build Without Errors and Pass Linting
description: Ensure that the entire codebase including API client, pages, and components build successfully and pass linting and SEO validations.

steps.description: Run frontend build process
Verify frontend build completes without errors or warnings
Run backend build and tests
Confirm backend builds and passes automated tests
Execute linting tools on codebase
Check no linting errors or style violations found
Run SEO audit on frontend pages
Confirm all SEO best practices are met as per design specification
